go back to sleep...\""},{"lineNumber":189913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……は、運んでおく」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'll carry embarrassed."},{"lineNumber":189919,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔を真っ赤にしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Their faces were completely flushed."},{"lineNumber":189920,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは心地よい揺れを感じながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Feeling a pleasant sway,"},{"lineNumber":189921,"originalJapaneseLine":"テントへと運ばれていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"you were carried toward the before."},{"lineNumber":189924,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当のいい女を見せるでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll show you what a truly good woman Reset"},{"lineNumber":189926,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスのことを聞いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"about Dark Lance."},{"lineNumber":189927,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど、なるほど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, I see...\""},{"lineNumber":189928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王ランスの第一子として、","translatedEnglishLine":"As the first child of Demon King Lance,"},{"lineNumber":189929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　鬼畜王戦争ではそのようにご活躍を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you played such an active role in the Brutal King War...\""},{"lineNumber":189930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":189931,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\""},{"lineNumber":189932,"originalJapaneseLine":"松下姫がうっとりとした溜め息を吐く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Princess Matsushita sighed dreamily."},{"lineNumber":189933,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ダークランス様、素敵でち」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Dark Lance-sama is wonderful.\""},{"lineNumber":189934,"originalJapaneseLine":"「松下姫はダークランス、好きだねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Princess Matsushita really likes Dark Lance, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":189935,"originalJapaneseLine":"「強く、たくましく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Strong and robust,"},{"lineNumber":189936,"originalJapaneseLine":"　弱者を守る優しさを備え……","translatedEnglishLine":"he has the kindness to protect the weak..."},{"lineNumber":189937,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そしてあの涼やかな風貌……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And that cool appearance...\""},{"lineNumber":189938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、あれこそ理想の男性の姿でち」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's definitely the ideal man.\""},{"lineNumber":189939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そこまで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-to that extent...\""},{"lineNumber":189940,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ピンと来ないねぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't quite get it..."},{"lineNumber":189941,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、私も兄ちゃん的な意味では好きだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I like him in a big brother kind of way though...\""},{"lineNumber":189942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「理想の男性かあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ideal man, huh..."},{"lineNumber":189943,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お姉様はどう思う？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you think, Oneesama?\""},{"lineNumber":189944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ダークランスだし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's Dark Lance after all...\""},{"lineNumber":189945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もうっ、みんなお子ちゃまでちわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, you all are such children.\""},{"lineNumber":189946,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ガーン、こんなぬいぐるみみたいな子に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah! To be called a child by someone who looks like a stuffed animal!?"},{"lineNumber":189947,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お子ちゃま扱いされた！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Being treated like a kid!?"},{"lineNumber":189948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、というわけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-well, that being said,"},{"lineNumber":189949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞、あなたもダークランス様のような","translatedEnglishLine":"<Yell>, you too should aim to become a fine man like Dark Lance-sama."},{"lineNumber":189950,"originalJapaneseLine":"　立派な男性を目指すことでちわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aim to be a respectable man.\""},{"lineNumber":189951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「弟なんでちから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because you're my younger brother,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはドッスの大きな腕の中で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were in Dos's big arms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱えられていた。
ドッスの隣にいるワッスは、
ドッスと同じように長田君を抱えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was holding Nagata-kun just like Dos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、眠ってしまったあなたは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that you, having fallen asleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドッスとワッスの二人に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were carried by the two of them, Dos and Wass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テントまで抱えられているらしい。
「……む、起こした、か」
「……じょ、女性だから、
触れていいか悩んだ、のだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hesitated on whether it was okay to touch you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……す、すまん」
ドッスはぶっきらぼうに、
しかし本当に申し訳なさそうに謝った。
あなたの言葉に二人は顔を見合わせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two looked at each other in response to your words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「良かった、です……」
「ね、寝て、下さい……」
「……は、運んでおく」
「とんでもない、です……」
「……これは、恩返し」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...This is a way to repay my debt."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「したいから、してる、だけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm doing it simply because I want to..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……俺達、その為に、ここにいる」
二人は照れているようだ。
顔を真っ赤にしていた。
あなたは心地よい揺れを感じながら、
テントへと運ばれていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were carried toward the tent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、今までよりも深く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, you felt you had grown closer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人と仲良くなれたような気がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the two of them than before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当のいい女を見せるでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll show you what a truly good woman is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旅の途中、松下姫はリセットに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the journey, Princess Matsushita asked Reset

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスのことを聞いていた。
「なるほど、なるほど……
魔王ランスの第一子として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As the first child of Demon King Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼畜王戦争ではそのようにご活躍を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you played such an active role in the Brutal King War..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 松下姫がうっとりとした溜め息を吐く。
「……ダークランス様、素敵でち」
「松下姫はダークランス、好きだねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Princess Matsushita really likes Dark Lance, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「強く、たくましく、
弱者を守る優しさを備え……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he has the kindness to protect the weak...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてあの涼やかな風貌……」
「ええ、あれこそ理想の男性の姿でち」
「そ、そこまで……」
「ピンと来ないねぇ……
まあ、私も兄ちゃん的な意味では好きだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I like him in a big brother kind of way though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「理想の男性かあ……
お姉様はどう思う？」
「ダークランスだし……」
「もうっ、みんなお子ちゃまでちわね」
「ガーン、こんなぬいぐるみみたいな子に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah! To be called a child by someone who looks like a stuffed animal!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お子ちゃま扱いされた！？」
「ま、というわけで、
＜エール＞、あなたもダークランス様のような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Yell>, you too should aim to become a fine man like Dark Lance-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立派な男性を目指すことでちわ」
「弟なんでちから、

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was holding Nagata-kun just like Dos.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As the first child of Demon King Lance,

まあ、私も兄ちゃん的な意味では好きだけど……」
